description.value: You specialize in blending into a particular type of environment, able to disappear after taking your shot. Choose either natural or urban terrain. In the chosen terrain, you can @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Hide]{Hide} and @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Sneak]{Sneak} even without cover or being @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed}.
